Class VeganMeal

java.lang.Object
hr.java.restaurant.model.Meal
hr.java.restaurant.model.VeganMeal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vegan
public final class VeganMeal extends Meal implements Vegan
Represents a vegan meal, which is a specific type of meal that adheres to vegan dietary requirements. This class extends the Meal class and implements the Vegan interface. It provides information about the portion size and specifies that the meal is gluten-free.

      public VeganMeal(String name, Category category, Ingredient[] ingredients, BigDecimal price, String portionSize)
      Constructs a new VeganMeal with the specified name, category, ingredients, price, and portion size.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the vegan meal
      category - the category to which the meal belongs
      ingredients - the ingredients of the meal
      price - the price of the meal
      portionSize - the portion size of the vegan meal
